description: Get your cabbage on with this scrumptious vegetarian recipe. Top roast cabbage steaks with a tahini dressing, pomegranate and dukkah for the ultimate vege feast.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Lemon,Budget,Summer,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Autumn,Dairy free,Apr 2021
name: Roast Cabbage Steaks With Tahini Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pomegranate, halved, seeds removed and reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle a large baking tray with half of the oil. Place cabbage on tray and turn to coat. Scatter with half of the dukkah. Bake for 30 minutes or until cabbage is golden and tender.

Meanwhile, place bread on a second large baking tray. Drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with remaining dukkah. Bake bread in the last 10 minutes of cabbage cooking time or until light brown and crispy. Cool bread for 2 minutes, then break into large pieces.
Meanwhile, place tahini, lemon juice, garlic and 1/4 cup water in a small bowl. Season and stir to combine. Sprinkle with a few pomegranate seeds and mint leaves.
Arrange cabbage on plates. Drizzle with dressing, and top with remaining pomegranate and mint leaves. Serve with bread.
